tagline: Lab Maitaining GUI for Raspberry PI
body:
### Welcome to Lab-Maintainer.
It is a specific oriented project for company's Laboratory built for simplify detectors enrollment and attaching them to the Power Max systems. Lab-Maintainer consists of reusable 
[Pintura](https://github.com/persvr/pintura) modules and 
[Perstore](http://github.com/persvr/perstore) it can be used on any 
JSGI compliant JavaScript platform, but is tested on NodeJS.
## Setup Lab-Maintainer
```
$  git clone https://github.com/Spalax/lab-maintainer.git lab-maintainer
$  cd lab-maintainer
$  npm install
$  git submodules init
$  git submodule update
```
## Run Lab-Maintainer
```
$ node index.js
```
Type in your browser http://localhost:8080
name: Lab-maintainer
